pages.title: Find an English-speaking translator or interpreter abroad

components.name: rhnpiT
components.content:
The Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office (FCDO) provides lists of English-speaking translators and interpreters abroad to help British nationals find the support they need.

You can search for translators and interpreters by country or a more specific location.

All providers on this list have confirmed they can:

  • translate and/or interpret to and from English
  • are qualified in their country to practice translation or interpretation
! Warning You should always do your own research and carry out your own checks into a provider before using them.

components.name: QLkbfP
components.content:
Disclaimer

The FCDO does not accept any liability to any person or company for any financial loss or damage suffered through using these service providers or from the use of this information or from any failure to give information. Our non-exhaustive lists are not recommendations and should not be treated as such. For further information, read the full terms and conditions

Feedback on service providers

If you have feedback on any translators or interpreters listed in this service, contact the British embassy or consulate in the relevant country. Providers will be removed from the list where appropriate.

Feedback on this service

If you have feedback specifically about this digital service, the FCDO welcomes your views. Email: digitalservicesfeedback@fco.gov.uk.

Apply to be added to this service

You can apply to be added to this service if you are based outside the UK and can provide translation or interpretation services to British nationals in English.

pages.title: Where in France do you need a translator or interpreter? (Optional)

components.name: wsAiEL
components.title: Where
components.hint: Enter a postcode, city or area. Leave blank to see results for the whole of France.

components.name: Uleqfq
components.content:
The FCDO does not accept any liability to any person or company for any financial loss or damage suffered through using these service providers or from the use of this information or from any failure to give information. Our non-exhaustive lists are not recommendations and should not be treated as such. For further information, read the full terms and conditions.

pages.title: In which country do you need a translator or interpreter?

components.name: country
components.title: Country list
components.hint: You can choose the language you need interpreting or translating later in this service.

components.name: wxuPQS
components.title: Services
components.hint: Select all the services that you need.

pages.title: What type of translation do you need?

components.name: EBORNa
components.title: Translate specialties
components.hint: Translation is when written content is translated into another language.

pages.title: What type of interpretation do you need?

components.name: nibvRx
components.title: Interpretation specialities
components.hint: Interpretation is when spoken language is interpreted into another language.

pages.title: Which language(s) do you need translating or interpreting?

components.name: languagesProvided
components.title: Language
components.hint: Add each language separately. Do not include English.

pages.title: What types of translating and interpreting do you need?

components.name: qCMbkI
components.title: Select the type of translation that you need
components.hint: Translation is when written content is translated into another language.

components.name: SgGoFj
components.title: Select the situation that you need an interpreter for
components.hint: Interpretation is when spoken language is interpreted into another language.
